channel.title: Can someone plzzzzzz
channel.description: can someone plz show me how to make it say that ur in wildy when u go into the wildy thanks ... and i mean when it says it in skulls in the corner and also...when ever a character attks another character or a monster ... with a sword it attks them as if they were rangeing like when u attk them it looks like ur ranging them ... how do i fix that?

item.title: Can someone plzzzzzz
item.dc:creator: @mervboyj mervboyj
item.description:
@mervboyj wrote:

well actually its just the melee-ing part… when im meleeing it looks like im ranging… but when i range im fine…
and i still need help with both this stuff… the wild and this

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone plzzzzzz
item.dc:creator: @an_apple an apple
item.description:
@an_apple wrote:

he means when ur supposed to be melee-ing it looks like your ranging and when your supposed to be ranging it looks like your melee-ing.

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone plzzzzzz
